channel.title: Plot on Timi's RStudio Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Plot on Timi's RStudio Tutorials

item.title: Histogram
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) Extracting the Data query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) Viualizing the Data ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="white",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body-Weight Distribution for Baseball Players") ## Warning: Removed 854 rows containing non-finite values (stat_bin).
